item.title: CVE-2024-4225|2024-04-30T06:57:58.822Z -- DPS Telecom -- NetGuardian DIN Remote Telemetry Unit (RTU)
item.description: Multiple security vulnerabilities has been discovered in web interface of NetGuardian DIN Remote Telemetry Unit (RTU), by DPS Telecom. Attackers can exploit those security vulnerabilities to perform critical actions such as escalate user's privilege, steal user's credential, Cross Site Scripting (XSS) and Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF).
